website_summaries.verdict: Great-looking basketball arcade game with dual baskets and 10 different scoring modes.
pros: Versatile game that offers multiple game-scoring options and an adjustable height for different ages of players
Steel tubing used in the frame to provide good sturdiness
Uses a classic design that reminds you of an arcade setting
cons: Scoring system seems to miscount shots at times, which can lead to frustration

customer_reviews.title: Best home basketball game on the market...fun for all!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 yr old and my 12 yr old boys. It's so sturdy...well built frame...not flimsy or cheap. This will be something that the whole family will enjoy as well as all the boys that come over to the house!!! There are a bunch of games to play and it’s really easy to control with the control panel on the front of the game. It is seriously the best purchase I've made in a long time. If you have a basement and kids that love sports...don't hesitate...this is the best one on the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great game (only one drawback - see below): PROS - kids, adults love it (usually more popular than foosball or others) - fits comfortably under a 7ft ceiling - very durable (frame, rims, backboard all top notch) - 7 basketballs and pump included - 6 different audio options (announcer is great) and volume can be adjusted - folds up when not in use and has wheels - 10 different games to choose from (some are just longer versions of the basic game) - very accurate scoring system (it's missed a few shots, but not many at all) CON - assembly does take some time (and patience) but in the end it's definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Janess

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build Quality | Great Company and Passion
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this over the Lifetime version for sure! Great build quality, love the passion on the website. Very solid and will be an absolute blast in the family for many years to come. Not sure if I wanted it or my kids! My rafters in photo are 103”, balls don’t come close to hitting them. I didn’t use any extensions. Can go up as kids get older. Games are fun. Instructions really aren’t the best, but reference the website pictures and it will all make sense. Took me about 2-3 hours to build. Tools I recommend: 1) Cordless Impact w/ Phillips (Scoreboard Sensors) 2) 4mm Allen Key (Bolt Heads) 3) Philips Handheld Screwdriver (Scoreboard) 4) 8 and 10mm Sockets (Nuts)
customer_reviews.author: CntryClub007

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Connector
customer_reviews.text: It took all morning and afternoon to set this beast up then the phone cord-like connection to the score board doesn’t stay plugged in! We tried to reach out the customer support but the email was hidden by Amazon. Please fix this for us! Thank you! To return, we have to spend another day breaking it down... ugh!
customer_reviews.author: BaseballMom

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: SO MANY GAMES, SO MUCH FUN !!!! My kids have had so much fun these last two days. It comes with 7 small basketballs, great for my 6 & 10 year olds. And the control panel is so cute—the buttons are balls that look just like the backboard. The kids can easily choose which game they want to play (there are 10) and what audio they want. They love the announcer and when he tells them they got a new high score. Absolutely perfect game for the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K

customer_reviews.title: Took two days to put together to find out oeft sensor doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: it took me my husband two days to put this together and in the end we noticed that the front left sensor did not work when we threw balls in the basket. The right works fine. I tried searching for a way to contact the seller to figure out if we could resolve this or figure out if there's a way we could troubleshooter to get it working since it took forever to put it together I don't really want to send it back but it does suck that we paid $279 for unit that doesn't work fully.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Pace

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money unless you want one basket to work
customer_reviews.text: I emailed the company 2 times. The sensor isn’t working we’ve followed the directions. Disassembled the sensor many times it just doesn’t work. Worst part no response after several emails.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, once you get it setup!
customer_reviews.text: It took about five hours to setup but after that it has been a lot of fun. The only step you really should have two people is for putting the dual basket ball hoop on the #1 top poles/tubes. This game feels like a bit of exercise after being in SIP for so long and for not really being active the last few weeks. Which is is good thing, need exercise. It's hard to beat for $300. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: John Behring

customer_reviews.title: The colors and head board look great, but the box came pretty banged up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not that impressed! The colors and head board look great, but the box came pretty banged up and the board had bends in it and the fabric is sturdy but does not have a frame so it kind of sags. I purchased an indoor basketball set from Costco for $100.00 and it was such a better build. Fabric is good, board looks great minus the dents and the fabric that catches the ball feels like quality but there are a few things that could be done for the overall improvement. Not impressed and not impressed with dents in the head board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shot clock wass defective and company refuses to respond
customer_reviews.text: First we thought it was a bad sensor but once sensor was replaced the shot clock still did not work. Repeatedly requested new shot clock but company just ignores requests
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to assemble. Great customer service. Variety of games. Adjustable height. Cons: Backboard leans forward a bit with height extensions in place. Don’t like the wire from controller to main unit as it is barely long enough and does not tuck away. When balls return they often ramp out onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: MyTwoCents

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, great customer support
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for a pop-a-shot for her birthday, and I feel like I got a present. Since we put it together, every day I get home from work both kids say "dad let's play pop-a-shot!" We have been having hours of fun playing. I researched different brands and am very happy with my purchase. I put it together in about 2 hours (very easy using my socket wrench). I had a question about the scoring not counting some baskets and emailed customer support and heard back from them within hours and they answered my question (if one player gets into the bonus round, the other player's baskets do not continue to count).
customer_reviews.author: tbone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rec room addition
customer_reviews.text: This was a family gift for the holidays and it has been played with daily! It's so much fun for everyone in the family and is a nice arm workout. It was easy to put together and send to be sturdy. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Muellertribe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's not cheap... but I don't have a problem spending money for my sons to do things other than videos games or procrastinating on the Internet. This basketball hoop, the ping pong table, the trampoline, the pool... all of those types of things are an investment in my children's long term mental health. Kids needs options other than electronics. And the adults that visit get just as much use out of this basketball setup as any kids do. It's a good time for all.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected quality! Very sturdy and fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I gambled that a few extra bucks got me better quality, and it paid off! Very sturdy, easy to fold and move, and extremely accurate counting the baskets. I swear, within an hour of getting it assembled, the family already played a dozen times! Love that the height is adjustable, even after assembly! Instructions... well... not the best... a few screws had to be assembled multiple times, to add features in a strange order. Not that hard, but it took extra time.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money. If you're going to play with this basketball hoop for more than a year, I would recommend buying a high quality set up than two low cost basketball games. This one is great, we love the different games and the variety of music. I love that it is battery powered so I don't have to keep it near an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Arrison IV

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sports 🏀 man cave. Visitors start shooting right away. Top of the line quality. Sensor works great. Audio is great as well. Would recommend the dual shot over the single for fun competitions. Assembly is involved, but worth it. Plan to use your own screwdrivers. Two adults are needed at some points in assembly. I would buy this again without hesitation...
customer_reviews.author: Jonesboy

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun for All Ages
customer_reviews.text: I'm 38 and bought this for myself and have no regrets! Its pure and simple fun. It's a bit tricky to assemble by yourself but it can be done, the directions are fairly easy to comprehend. The one thing I would suggest is installing the backboard first then putting on the rims and electronics, doing so reduces the weight of the backboard and makes it manageable to hoist it and secure it by yourself. The score counter is accurate and there are a number of games.
customer_reviews.author: Twofoursix

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and relatively robust
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased thus far with this 12/25/2018 Christmas present to my boys... assembly was pretty straightforward and so far everything works... including the electronics (shot counter, scoring, speakers, displays). Backboards are sturdy. Frame is metal (should lead to longer life). Overall very pleased with this product. Adjustable height options on the backboard are nice touch so you can personalize to low or high ceiling room ... not something you'll likely adjust after assembly complete but nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Guy A. Blissett

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with the others
customer_reviews.text: We have had a cheaper version of toy and it was just junk. The construction of the Pop-a-Shot brand product is far superior. Putting it together is a little tedious but if you use your own tools it goes pretty quickly. The instructions were an 8/10 but that is better than most manuals for this type of product (usually a 4/10). The fact that it has wheels is a huge plus; makes is very easy to move around the room and it folds up very easily. While it is significantly more expensive than cheaper "knock-offs," it is worth the money. It will last longer given that it has higher quality parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Arcade quality basketball game; no quarters needed!
customer_reviews.text: This Pop-A-Shot replaced a worn out $99 plastic tube framed game that started breaking its first day. This metal framed Pop-A-Shot game was pretty easy to put together, especially with an enthusiastic 10 year old chomping at the bit, passing parts and tools. High quality components and seven balls! I like the wide variety of different games one can play so you are never bored. Single or double play options. The wiring from the controller to the scoreboard is a bit exposed if you have rambunctious youngsters. Would have liked a longer wire to route underneath vs along the side. This will last a lifetime I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Janny

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF FUN
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED VERY QUICKLY. FIRST THING I NOTICED WHILE OPENING THE BOX WAS HOW WELL EVEYTHING IS MADE. HIGH QUALITY, DURABLE CONSTRUCTION. assembly WAS PRETTY EASY AFTER I USED MY OWN TOOLS. WRENCH/SCREWDRIVER THEY PROVIDE IS NEXT TO USELESS. REQUIRES 2 PEOPLE TO SAFELY INSTALL BACKBOARD. ONCE UP THERE ARE PLENTY OF DIFFERENT GAMES TO TRY AND ALL ARE A BLAST. MY WIFE AND I ARE NOT ONLY HAVING FUN BUT ARE GETTING A GREAT WORKOUT WHILE DOING SO. SMALL FOOTPRINT FOR LOADS OF FUN. WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Kari H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, but it is MADE IN CHINA!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. You will need a 10mm socket with a 1/4" ratchet, an 8mm socket, and a 5/32" allan wrench. A cordless drill / driver set on light toque with a 1/4" drive adapter will save you even more time. The entire family loves this game. Unfortunately, it is "MADE IN CHINA"... THIS COVID-19 FIASCO has changed me for good. I hope we can get it together AMERICA her soon, and make OUR own products to help preserve OUR AMERICAN FUTURE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for home entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son (as well as his dad and uncle) is extremely pleased with this indoor basketball game! His favorite mode is #14, Tug of War. This is the perfect addition to our kid cave! It's lightweight so I can move it to clean around and he can fold it up when not in use to make room for other activities. We have had an issue with one of the rims breaking loose from the plate but customer service is replacing. Even with the rim break, it didn't stop every member of our family playing multiple games over Christmas break! I highly recommend this product from age 5 to 95!
customer_reviews.author: aedans mom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: The electronics broke after 1 week of use and we didn't even use it every day. Now the unit won't power on even after changing batteries or plugging it into an outlet. I would be happy if this lasted one year but 1 week is ridiculous, especially after spending several hours putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Su

customer_reviews.title: Awesome--best in home one out there!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Price was good, quality is great. Our 4 buys got this for Christmas and love it. Set up took me (one person) about 3 hours, with 2 mistakes of my own fault I had to back track on. Directions were exact. All the pieces came. If doing on your own, you do need a bit of strength and innovation to get the backboard up by yourself. Great product! Extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Sellek

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this thing! We use it a lot and honestly we are always competing to be the high score. It’s been great to have especially due to quarantine. It’s way nicer then I thought it would be and is totally worth it. I did have to buy some black zip ties from the dollar tree to keep the back board from moving but that was an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and fun
customer_reviews.text: At first I was thinking this was pretty pricey but after putting it together and playing on it I know why it is expensive; because it’s worth it. The sensors count every basket, the backboard and rims are of good quality as is the frame. The basketballs are nice too. We’ve had tons of fun on this hoop as a family, kids and adults alike. Highly recommend to anyone that likes shooting hoops! P.S. I put this all together by myself but I would recommend getting some help when it’s time to mount the backboard to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Lots of fun. I’m 83 years old and love the challenge.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for fun and grand kids. Well made and well engineered. A little tough to put together, but that was because of my old age. I highly recommend Pop a Shot for fun and entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D.

customer_reviews.title: Friggin Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the jam man. It's awesome, we love it, our 4 year old loves it, just let him stand on a chair and he's got a fair shot at making some hoops. Best part is we didn't use any of the extension pieces so if we move to a home with higher ceilings it goes even taller than this! Love the sounds, the many game modes, and it was SO EASY to put together. Love how you guys packaged the hardware instead of throwing it all loose in a bag that was super dope. When it's crappy outside it's game night in our basement. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kit Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our basement game room that has 7 foot ceilings. The height is adjustable so was able to fit perfectly. Easy to assemble. We Enjoyed the different game modes you can play. Since we had some kids that wanted to play with adults and didn’t want to get beat every time,....we played the team mode and teamed up a child with an adult so the score was cumulative. Great addition to the game room and is a game that everyone can play. Scoring was accurate. No problems with electronics, Bought additional balls to avoid fists fights while grabbing returning balls.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Sims

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and put it in my man cave. We along with anyone that comes over and plays loves it. It is well built and gives you hours of enjoyment. It folds up nicely and has wheels so you can move it around if you need to. Only one slight flaw is when the balls come back down there is an opening where the webbing doesn't go all the way down on both sides and sometimes the balls go through but with a little ingenuity can easily be fixed. Overall a good product. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Baker

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - product quality extremely poor.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product less than 1 year ago. It gets minimal use a few shots a day for 10 or 15 minutes and we have had to replace the basket rims twice. They are flimsey and the welding poor so thenrim detaches from the base. We are now in need of a 3rd set. The netting is also poor tore on one side within a week. I would never purchase this product again. A friend sai pop a shot was the best but i will tell you the brand we had preiously lasted years with no issues. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B DeVere

customer_reviews.title: WE STILL LOVE IT! Best Buy from Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up very well in 2019! 2 boys and a dad. One minor complaint , not even worth deducting any stars, is the small counter thing on the front(not the basket counter)we had to tape on and it looks a lil tacky. I don’t play, so I don’t know what it’s even used for but it’s been taped on from the beginning. Maybe something to attach it was missing??? Doesn’t affect play at all though and we’re super satisfied with the product! Very accurate basket counts and multiple games.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Belle

customer_reviews.title: I expected better quality. Apparently others have also had problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: Only one sensor worked. Which you can’t possibly know until after you spend oodles if hours putting it together. So there is no way you would take it apart and return it. For $100 more than comparable products, I expected better quality. Apparently others have also had problems with the sensors which should be easy and cheap for the manufacturer to get right!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous523

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I put this together rather quickly. It wasn’t too difficult but def have a few hours ready to kill and something to drink (beer, wine, etc). Once set up it has created hours of fun for us and our friends. Being in our 30’s with no kids (yet) we set it up in our den for some half time entertainment and weekend drinking fun. IE suitable for “adults” 😂 Hope it last long enough for our future kids to enjoy. Don’t see any reason why it wouldn’t less an electrical issue.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rothenberg

customer_reviews.title: This has been great. We did have an issue with the clips ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. We did have an issue with the clips on the 'On/Off' selector, so be careful when you attach that. (last step if I remember right), but the thing has been great. Sturdy, pretty accurate and a lot of fun. Update 2/7/18: Company emailed and told me the directions on attaching the 'On/Off' were an issue, so they are sending me a new one to replace the one with a broken clip. (Haven't received yet) The product is very solid and we love it. Company is also great as I feel confident they will do what they said. Purchase with confidence, but be aware that it's a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best instructions and clearly labeled parts
customer_reviews.text: Best instructions ever and every part labeled well. All bolts, nuts, screws came in one package that were separated and labeled by number. No missing parts. Helpful to have help for connecting large parts. Takes a couple hours but it is the only large assembly toy that came with clear instructions. Must be made in USA. Love it. My son had played non stop since yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for the Whole Family!
customer_reviews.text: We are a basketball family with kids ages 7, 9 and 11. Everyone can play and it's been a lot of fun for our family and for our kids when they have friends over. There are 10 different game settings and we use many of them. There is music and voice prompts for the time, when you've reached a bonus round, etc. There are a couple extra pieces to adjust the height and length. The construction is good and as long as we're careful I think it should hold up well enough over time. We read reviews of many different games and are really happy we went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: M&K'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: "Santa" brought this for our house. It took my husband & I about 2 hrs to assemble (with power tools & good teamwork). But man is it worth it, everything we wanted and more. The games are awesome, it's so accurate for scoring, well made & sturdy. It will last our family for a long time & guests love it too! Definitely worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson for Christmas. Everything was great with delivery and putting it together was not bad, but right sensor was bad. Good thing we found out before Christmas to get a replacement and they sent it right away. Works perfectly now and children and adults are playing. Good way to get everyone away from connected devices and do something physical.
customer_reviews.author: B. Elaine

customer_reviews.title: What a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's birthday and he has used it every single day according to his mom and dad. I hesitated about spending the extra funds for this brand but figured I would take a chance and my son in law says it is very sturdy and was fairly easy to assemble. Sometimes you just get what you pay for and that seems to be the case here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old son for Christmas. Him and I (Mom) put it together in a couple of hours. It went much faster once I found a better wrench (Metric 10) and the right sized drill bit. Instructions were clear. This is very sturdy, we have it in the basement and have already used it a lot!! I had it delivered to the neighbors house because it said it could not be “disguised “ in another box. It actually was in a second box with only a sticker, maybe 2 x 2 inches that said basketball.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It is well designed/made and my kids love it. It is a bit of a process to put it together, but it is worth it. The backboard on mine was damaged on one of the corners (it still works fine), so I am going to reach out to the seller to request either an extended warranty or a replacement backboard. I am really glad I bought it. It has been hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: T. Condon

customer_reviews.title: Fun if you can tolerate the torture of assembly. Highly recommend paying for others to assemble it.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 10 game modes, has sound and music, fun to play Cons: Made in China, assembly was a nightmare with difficult instructions to follow — had to retrace steps multiple times which was super annoying. Need 2 adults to assemble — too me, my wife, our 8-yr old son a solid 2-3 hrs with breaks due to frustration over how clawed the design and instructions were.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo V. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great hoop system for the price... and amazon wins again for shipping this to our APO all the way in Germany! Assembly can be confusing and instructions can be a bit tricky... my 14yr old son and I were able to assemble but we made two mistakes that required some parts to be disassembled and corrected...
customer_reviews.author: Glen T. Lukasik

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this at the beginning of the stay at home order and its so much fun! We have 5 adults in our house and without it we'd be so bored! Its great because it has 16 different games to play. Highly recommend especially now. It also came like two weeks before they said it would so it was a really nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Off to a bumpy, mixed start!
customer_reviews.text: Game looks great and sounds great. Arrived damaged though (that's on Amazon, not pop-a-shot, i know). Struggling with sensors a bit - definitely not registering all baskets made most rounds. Will update if PAS and Amazon can help address both situations. Any tricks on how to get sensors working better? Seems like they do in most reviews. Thanks! UPDATE: Amazon hasn't been great, but Pop-a-Shot has checked in several times, and is sending a replacement for the damaged backboard, along with additional sensors. Customer service has been excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, this! Ordered an air hockey table, which arrived damaged and amazon replaced it, but the 2nd one was also damaged, so I moved on to this. My 5 year old son loves it and we play every day! Setup wasn’t bad for my husband. Hoping this lasts for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Bears Fan

customer_reviews.title: The fun hasn’t stopped.
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas gift ever! I bought this for my son as Christmas gift in 2017. Jump ahead to over a year later and there hasn’t been a single day when he has not shot at least one ball! He is 14 now and he loves to challenge me and all my friends that stop over. He usually whoops us but every so often we’ll get a win in. The construction is spot on, we’ve had no issues with it what so ever. It’s a great indoor game that keeps the kids away from their phones and video games. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve David

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Product, 2 of 7 Basketballs were defective.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially when considering the discount at the time of purchase. Great activity to keep the family entertained. Only issue is 2 of the balls will not stay inflated. Amazon has an all or nothing return policy, and I wasn't about to try and fit everything back in the box after the assembly process. I will just pump those 2 balls up before each use with the supplied ball pump. Not a cheaply made product, after several comparisons this is the basketball game to buy 🏀.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stieber

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: My family has gotten hours of use out of the Pop-A-Shot. We love it. Construction very good. Not overly burdensome to assemble. My only gripe would be that the sensors would miss made baskets with some regularity. It seems that this is an issue with nearly all similar systems that I researched. As mentioned by others, an easy fix was to undo the net from the back few loops in the rim and loop them into the front loops. This solved the problem, presumably because the net occasionally obstructs the view of the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: NLM

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and folds up easily
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and well designed equipment. It was easy to assemble and folds up easily. My grandsons, 6 and 4 yrs respectfully, enjoy it. What I don't like is the sound effects are subpar and a little degrading. As a retired elementary school Health and PE teacher, I would rather hear better encouraging words from the sound effects comments other than, if you don't make any baskets during the game time, it makes this corny comment, "are you still there?" That is demotivating for young people trying their best. Besides that, good piece of equipment and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: kayjo1971

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor game for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Be prepared to spend 3-4 hours to assemble. My hubby is an engineer, pretty mechanically inclined and it took him just about 4 hours to put together. The kids love it, it is nice once it is put together, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a isolation miracle!! With Covid going on the kids and husband were bored and with rain almost everyday going out wasn’t always an option. This goal has been so much fun!! It is sturdy and still easy to move around. It has lots of games too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Scoreboard fix.  Sensor Problem
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kids, but after assembling the unit, it would not score any baskets. I messed with the sensors and emailed Pop-a-Shot. Their customer service was very nice and sent me a replacement scoreboard and sensors. Since both sides were not working, I assumed it was the scoreboard and replaced it. No difference. So I moved on and replaced the sensors - still not working! I then read a post from years back about the net getting in the way of the sensors and unhooked the back of the net and double hooked it to the front. Works perfectly now. That appears to be the fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this pop-a-shot
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this pop-a-shot!!! Got it for my son for Christmas but I think my husband plays it more! So far, it's holding up really well! Only one con: the games listed on the instructions were not properly numbered/named. Therefore, we had to go through & "re-number" each game. Not really a big deal though!
customer_reviews.author: AMatos

customer_reviews.title: Who needs NCAA????  We now have tournaments in our home :)
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our little one's birthday, for something new for us to do during Covid shutdown. It is SO much fun! It did take 2 of us to put together, but once complete - let the games begin. We def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dc doc

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Want to give this 5 stars but the assembly instructions were not all accurate and the control panel tabs broke because it only fits on the center of the bar not on the sides like the illustration. Unfortunately the email containing this information came after we assembled. UPDATE!!- I contacted customer service about the control panel and they immediately got back to me. They sent me a new one and were very apologetic. They were attentive and eager to make things right....SO that being said I'm giving it the 5 stars I originally wanted to. The product is AWESOME and my family loves it and the customer service is top notch! I DEFINITELY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Moira Cavell

customer_reviews.title: Would help to have all the pieces
customer_reviews.text: Screws were missing; package damaged on corner. UPS took at least 5 times to deliver the item, calling to tell me that the UPS station was overloaded for Christmas. Thank goodness I ordered very early to get in time for Christmas. Assembly was difficult particularly with the missing pieces. Had to improvise by finding others around the house. I think though this item will provide entertainment for my two grandchildren for some time to come, as long as she is willing to keep it up. Takes up a significant amount of room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley J. Kalisch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in our game room, it’s big though. We absolutely love it. Quality and so much fun! Took 30 minutes to assemble, missing two nuts. Otherwise well packaged. Comes with 7 balls and ball pump. Folds well for storage.
customer_reviews.author: stephk

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Santa!
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for our boys, ages 8 & 5. Our boys & their friends have a lot of fun with it! It is well constructed, fairly simple assembly, can use batteries or plug into the wall, & can fold up to save space. It can also be adjusted higher as our boys grow! One of our hoops was bent & we rec’d excellent customer service from pop a shot. They quickly sent a new hoop replacement. Highly recommend, you wont b disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: SeaDreams

customer_reviews.title: VERY SOLID PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest and say this is a very addicting game to have at home. It's a bit tough to put together alone, but doable if you are strong. Overall, very solid purchase. There were two minor issues with this game.... 1) Have a print out of the games as a clip on so we can easily see what each of the ten numbered games are. 2) Scoring accuracy has been improved after receiving new sensors. Went from 85% accuracy to 95%. With new sensors, out of 200 shots, approximately 197 were correct. Previously, it was roughly, 180. Overall, the best basketball home arcade game I've ever owned and great responsive customer service!
customer_reviews.author: PowerCage80

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME AND SO MUCH FUN!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best items i could have purchased for our children's program! The can't wait to play! It develops healthy competition, concentration, and channels tempestuous anxiousness to healthy aggression THANK YOU! I wish every kid and family should have one! It brings people together!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great team building opportunity
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Slam Dunk event at our office...it brought people together from all departments for friendly competition. And the shortest person (a female) won! Lots of options for play - sound on/off, etc. It was fairly easy to put together (I did it with minimal assistance) and will fold up when not in use if needed. Note: it is too large to move to other rooms without taking it apart so set it up where you want to keep it. Looking forward to many fun days of competition ahead. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We bought this for our 9 year old son for Christmas and it has been fun for the entire family (parents, grandparents, and 6 year old daughter!) . Fairly easy to assemble....took my husband and I about 1.5 hours. No fancy tools required. Very sturdy yet not too difficult to move if needed. Lots of different games/settings that can entertain individual players or competing against one another. Now if my husband can just find a way to beat my son's record :)
customer_reviews.author: Renee M Fornes

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun for my whole family
customer_reviews.text: Endless fun for our whole family. Currently have it in the yard. We move it under our covered porch when it rains so the wheels comes in handy. Moved easily and folds up. I wish there was a waterproof outdoor cover for this.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this BB Game fun it helps with customers waiting for orders to be filled in my business. Customers love the opportunity to relax and our employees don't feel rushed thinking the customer are mad waiting. WIn WIn. Customer Service by Pop A Shot..... WOW... With anything, things break or don't work when you get them, but knowing the service you will get to get the parts you need to make it work, thats the real proof of a great company. Thanks!!!! for getting my game back up and running for my customers. Loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Arcade Game for Game Room
customer_reviews.text: We all love this basketball arcade game. The different selections of games are fun, it fits perfectly into our new basement game room, and we love the exercise it provides for our kids.
customer_reviews.author: Arvilla C. Fee

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Lifetime one for many years, and my kids loved it. But after lots of abuse, it finally was time to get rid of it. I was thinking of ordering the same one, but then found this product well reviewed on Amazon. I decided to give it a try. I'm so glad I did! The multiple game modes add some fun depth to the game (the cross-shooting is harder than you think!). Very sturdy design, accurate scoring (a must with competitive children) and a fun retro look. I am THRILLED with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need seller to contact me.
customer_reviews.text: The left side scoring stopped working after one week. We’ve had & continue to have visitors that play it all the time & it takes away from the competitiveness of the game to not have the score show up. I do not know how to contact the seller for help either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wish it didn't have issues. Sweet design!
customer_reviews.text: Well... All was good after about a week of playing the backboard arches down so bad, the audio is static and you can't even understand the announcer and the screen flickers, mine seems to have some extreme electronic issues.. unfortunately we had to buy a new one from a local store as we needed it for a birthday gift setup.. sucks this pretty much went to waste and now sits in the garage.. The build and the design is flawless just seems I got a defective one somehow. :(
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: electronic score not working
customer_reviews.text: It took us hours to put the game together. Then we tried to play it . The score on the left side worked, but the score on the right side worked on and off. Sometimes it would count the ball going in and other times it would not work at all. My husband is a Master Electrician. He said that was either the moniters on the right side or a bad connection in the score pad. These 3 items need to be replaced. The game was delivered and set up yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Charlien

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandkids playroom (girl 11, boy8) and even the grown ups have lots of fun with this game. I found a YouTube video for instructions to put this together and had it done in 2 hours by myself. Didn't bother with included instructions but did make sure every part was included as per the list. It's only been a few days but the construction seems pretty sturdy, and there are 3 different height settings, mine is set on the lowest position and is only inches from the ceiling and still have no problem playing. Kids and adults WILL have a lot of fun with this game!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my kids thinking it would be fun. In the back of my mind, I expected a terrible kids' toy knock-off of a pop-a-shot. I was wrong. This thing is the real deal. A great adaptation of the arcade version. Assembly was easy but time-consuming. Once you get it all put together it's way more solid than I was expecting. My kids and I have played a ton of games and we will continue to play a ton of games. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dean D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at my daughter's birthday party. Everyone loved playing it. Pros: fun to play, entertained everyone even the 4-5 year olds Cons: assembling it was HORRIBLE...so many pieces and screws and washers, you definitely need 2 people to assemble this together. You definitely cannot leave this outdoors if it gets windy because it always sounds like it's guna rip. Other than the time consuming assembly, playing is the most fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rad Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Keep Accurate Score
customer_reviews.text: Put it together, it is actually very sturdy and attractive. The problem - the electronic score does not work very well. First, it gives points to the opposite side - thought maybe we put it together wrong. That's an easy fix right... no we didn't put it together wrong. But, no big deal - mentally you know to reverse it for the winner. The bigger issue, it does not keep track of all the baskets. Maybe we are just too good and it can't keep up with us. LOL. But, now we have this big thing in our home and in order to return it, we have to take it all apart.
customer_reviews.author: SandyRed

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old son for Christmas 2019. My 20 year old son assembled it. My son said the directions were clear and it was easy to assemble. It is sturdy and keeps an accurate score. My 10 year loves to play it and so does my 20 year old and all of his friends too. Definitely a great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda B

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: My son got the dual pop-a-shot for his birthday and we couldn't be happier. We have had the best time competing against each other. The structure is very sturdy and the sensors are spot on. Love how you can fold it up to make space. It is very large and takes up a lot of the room when open, but all the fun we are having with it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Wickum

customer_reviews.title: it is a very fun game, gives your kids something to do other ...
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to assemble, I would strongly encourage you to check the website for the last step in assembly. The picture in the instructions show attaching the control pad to the side, but the instructions on the web site tell you to attach it in the center. Attaching it to the side will cause you to break the tabs on the control pad. After braking one tab, we have since broke another, thus we just leave the control pad in the center. There does seem to be some scoring inconsistencies, but we haven't figured out the cause. On the positive, it is a very fun game, gives your kids something to do other than play video games.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love to Pop A Shot!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this thing!!! My daughter and I played and played and had a blast! Assembly is fairly straight forward and not too difficult. It took me a couple of hours. The audio is good and the different games make it interesting and challenging to play. It is the first piece of fun in my man cave. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Scoreboard doesn’t read the shots correctly
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built. It’s sturdy and the balls feels good in your hands. I only gave it 3 stars cuz the most import part which is the electronic scoreboard doesn’t read the score correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bad boy a couple weeks ago. Took about 2 hrs to put together but was worth it. One of the parts was missing a hole for the clip to go in but I drilled it and it worked. I contacted Pop-a-Shot about it and they sent me a new part and it was here in a couple days. Great service and product. The scoreboard can work with just batteries or you can plug it in which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Was really easy to put together. Have not seen directions like that in a long time actually labeling pieces and writing the instructions and showing a picture! It is very sturdy and durable definitely worth the cost and even at the cost is not that expensive for everything it is. My 11 year old daughter just beat me 44-12....I think her sensors are counting the baskets twice!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Family fun for 6 and up !
customer_reviews.text: Family fun and surprisingly sturdy. 2 nets for competition. Audio adds another dimension to the experience. Got it in Garage. Do far so good !
customer_reviews.author: MUSIC EAR

customer_reviews.title: Such a great gameroom toy!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a great time using this in our gameroom. Easy to assemble and super fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Robin

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: The pop a shot works wonderfully. The sound quit working after about 4 months. I contacted Pop A Shot customer service and they were amazing. They sent a new electronics kit and I had it in 3 days. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kmmabt

customer_reviews.title: Great game, but broke fast
customer_reviews.text: Game is great...however. We put it together on 10/3 and last night, 10/19, it stopped working. Obviously, we can still shoot hoops, but part of the fun is the game keeping score and the race against the clock. This game has had minimal to moderate use. I’d say we’ve used it on 4 occasions as our son is 8yo and scared of his own shadow also he won’t go down to the basement alone.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Diedrich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome indoor sport
customer_reviews.text: My kids and husband haven't stopped playing this. It's just challenging enough even for my basketball player kids. It's a lot of fun to compete or just shoot by yourself. It closes super easily. My son says sometimes when he makes a shot it doesn't register on scoreboard. Kind of $ but for us, worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.text: That's my high score right now. My daughter and I have a lot of fun with it. I started out shooting with both hands but now I mainly focus on my dominant hand. Two things I would change. First, it would be cool if the commentary would have a wider range of phrases, or better yet, be updatable. Secondly, it would be nice if it folder up since it takes up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: The backboard is attractive and sturdy. The assembled product is top notch
customer_reviews.text: The steel framing members are heavy guage, not flimsy at all. The backboard is attractive and sturdy. The assembled product is top notch! The instructions are good but confusing at times. On a few occasions we assembled components only to find out we needed to disassemble, then reassemble. But no big deal! I'd recommend this product to anyone wanting a quality basketball game.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C.

customer_reviews.title: Made well and SO fun!!
customer_reviews.text: So fun !!! Everyone loves it amd customer service is great, very well made!! Highly RECOMMENDED!! Had some issues but contacted the company and they were great..sent me what i needed to fix a faulty system. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Minery Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a great company!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have loved playing with the Pop-A-Shot basketball game! The system doesn’t miss scoring baskets, like I have seen some others do. Even their customer service is top notch! I had broken one of the tabs on the Control Panel while trying to snap it on the wrong portion of the lean bar. I sent them an email and they were quick to reply that they were sending another one to me (at no charge!!!). I have family coming to visit for Christmas and will definetly recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Pop-A-Shot! The biggest selling point for me was the fact that it uses laser beams to count made shots instead of the cheaper plastic paddles which can break and leave it useless. It is sturdy, has an adjustable height, and comes with 7 balls. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: M Ripley

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son for Christmas, but the whole family loves it! So many different games to play and hours of entertainment! It was easy to put together, but took time (about two hours for two people). Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Briana J Paciorek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our game room
customer_reviews.text: Placed it upstairs in our 8’ high ceiling game room. Adults and kids loved challenging each other. For setup, highly recommend the YouTube video vs the printed instructions.
customer_reviews.author: detconnection

customer_reviews.title: Really fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so much fun for our family. Putting it together took a while and was def a two person job but we got it done and play with it a lot. For the most part it recognizes the baskets but misses some every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: S. Josef

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my family and everyone loves it!. We challenge everyone who comes to visit. It's durable, fairly easy to put together, there was only one part of the instruction we found a slight bit confusing. But overall it's great quality and hours of fun. Oh it also would be nice if the nets on the side fit a little tighter to the poles as we occasionally have balls squeezing through but overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dlana

customer_reviews.title: Best game... pay attention to the advice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The whole family loves it. Different games to choose from and it will bring back some good old memories. Tip: it comes with a well detailed manual but my advise is to visit their website and see the video. Actually there is a small paper with the package asks you to do so. Do NOT ignore the video. Also, prepare a good list of songs and music so you enjoy the time spent on constructing the game.
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: non-stop fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great quality. If you're gonna be nit picky, having 8 basketballs would have been nice, ours only came with 7 balls. As soon as it was setup, my kids and every neighborhood kid around have been playing it constantly. It has been one of the best "kid" purchases we have ever made as a family. We have no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brian Truss

product_meta.title: Pop-A-Shot Official Home Dual Shot Basketball Arcade Game
feature_bullets: 16 INDIVIDUAL GAMES: Featuring 16 different games--the most of any arcade basketball game--and six audio options, the Home Dual Shot provides interactive game play for hours.

THE ULTIMATE BASKETBALL ARCADE GAME: From the pioneers that created the original Pop-A-Shot basketball game comes the completely redesigned Home Dual Shot with revolutionary technology and multiple game options.
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made from sturdy 1 ½" steel tubes with a powder coating to eliminate rusting and chipping and a thick nylon ramp, the Home Dual Shot will last for years.

INCREDIBLY ACCURATE: Using proprietary infrared sensors and revised placements, the Home Single Shot scoring system is nearly 100% accurate. A large, three-digit scoreboard and audio jack to power external speakers enhance game play.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
